          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflex action</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflextätigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Action réflexe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ação reflexo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Azione riflessa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανακλαστική ενέργεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acción refleja</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates what happens in the nervous system and muscles during a reflex action.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">intermediate neurone</string>
          </keyword>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, was im nervösen System 
und in den Muskeln während einer Reflextätigkeit geschieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre ce qui se produit 
dans le système et les muscles nerveux pendant une action réflexe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra o que acontece no 
sistema e nos músculos nervosos durante uma ação reflexo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che cosa accade nel
sistema e nei muscoli nervosi durante l'azione riflessa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει τι συμβαίνει στο 
νευρικό σύστημα και τους μυς κατά τη διάρκεια μιας ανακλαστικής 
ενέργειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra qué sucede en el 
sistema y los músculos nerviosos durante una acción refleja.</string>
          </description>
